summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3792 for the improvement of Genesee Street from Rainier Avenue to 38th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46708, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
